title: Am considering downgrading some C46s...any interest?
author: cdn_collector

posts.post_title: Am considering downgrading some C46s...any interest?
posts.post_content:
Evening Folks,

This might be bizarre, but I am considering cracking some graded C46s for a display that I'm putting together, and got to wondering if maybe there was somebody out there with presentable raw C46s they might want to upgrade instead.  I've never cracked out a graded card, and really don't want to ruin them.

That said, here are links to the 4 graded cards I'm speaking of.  If anyone is interested in a cash & trade deal, shoot me an email [richard@richardarmstrong.ca].

Thanks!

Richard.

PSA 5 Joe Kelley:
[IMG]http://www.richardarmstrong.ca/baseball/Toronto/C46_27_Kelley.jpg[/IMG]

SGC 50 James McGinley
[IMG]http://www.richardarmstrong.ca/baseball/Toronto/C46_2_McGinley.jpg[/IMG]

SGC 30 John Lush:
[IMG]http://www.richardarmstrong.ca/baseball/Toronto/C46_33_Lush.jpg[/IMG]

SGC 40 Al Shaw:
[IMG]http://www.richardarmstrong.ca/baseball/Toronto/C46_83_Shaw.jpg[/IMG]

Richard- I happened to notice that my C46 Lush is only a PSA 1 and your SGC 30 would be an upgrade. What would you want for the Lush + my Lush? I can crack out the Lush I have and send it as a raw card. 
Bob
